Achievements.Name: Shoot it!
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Record 25 shots in 1 period of play on Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Penalty Kill special
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score a goal when 2 men down on Pro Mode.

Achievements.Name: Last Minute of play
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score a goal in the last minute of play on Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: AHL® upset
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Beat an NHL® team with an AHL® team on Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Elite League upset
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Beat an NHL® team with an Elite League team on Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Penalty Shot Hero
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score a goal on the penalty shot in Pro Mode

Achievements.Name: Stay out of the box
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Play an entire game in Superstar Mode without getting a penalty

Achievements.Name: He Shoots, He Scores
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score a goal with the Goalie on Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Players of the game
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Earn all 3 stars in Superstar Mode

Achievements.Name: Create a Team
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile use a Created Team in a Play Now game

Achievements.Name: Create a Skater
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile use a Created Skater in a Play Now game

Achievements.Name: Create a Goalie
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile use a Created Goalie in a Play Now game

Achievements.Name: Goalie's nightmare
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score 70 Goals with one player in Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: On a roll
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Win 5 games in a row in the Playoffs in Dynasty Mode

Achievements.Name: Regular Season best
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile have your Team finish the regular season with the best overall record

Achievements.Name: Tournament Champs
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Win the EA Sports World Tournament

Achievements.Name: Fun for all
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Be on the winning team in an Online Team Play game

Achievements.Name: Playing as a team
Achievements.Description: As NHL® 08 Lead Profile win an Online Ranked VS. Game with a friend on the same Xbox 360 console

Achievements.Name: OT Winner
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Win an Online Ranked Versus Game in Overtime

Achievements.Name: Shootout Mastery
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Win an Online Ranked Versus Game in Shootout Overtime

Achievements.Name: Shorthanded, No Problem
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Score a Shorthanded Goal in an Online Ranked Versus Game

Achievements.Name: Seeing lots of rubber
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Record 40 shots or more on goal in an Online Ranked Versus Game

Achievements.Name: Shutting the door
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Record a shutout in an Online Ranked Versus Game

Achievements.Name: Shootout King
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Play 25 Online Ranked Shootout Games

Achievements.Name: Online all the time
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Play 50 Online Ranked Versus Games

Achievements.Name: Beating tough competition
Achievements.Description: As the lead NHL® 08 Profile Beat an opponent ranked Online in the Top 50
